# UIDocument.ChangeKind

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the kind of change to a document.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ChangeKind
```

## Overview

You specify one of these constants as a parameter of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/updateChangeCount(_:)] method.

## Constants

- **UIDocument.ChangeKind.done**: A change has been made to the document.
- **UIDocument.ChangeKind.undone**: A change to the document has been undone.
- **UIDocument.ChangeKind.redone**: An undone change to the document has been redone.
- **UIDocument.ChangeKind.cleared**: The document is cleared of outstanding changes.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **UIDocument.SaveOperation**: Constants that specify the type of save operation.
- **UIDocument.State**: Constants that specify the document state.
- **userActivityURLKey**: The key that identifies the document associated with a user activity.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
